name: org_slug
description: Unique organization identifier (Multi-tenancy ID). Example: 'guru_inc_123'.

name: subscription_id
description: Unique primary key for the subscription. Often a hash or provider ID. Example: 'sub_openai_01'.

name: provider
description: Name of the SaaS vendor or provider. Normalized to lowercase. Example: 'openai', 'slack'.

name: plan_name
description: Specific plan tier name. Example: 'team', 'enterprise', 'pro'.

name: display_name
description: Human-readable display title for UI/Reports. Example: 'ChatGPT Team'.

name: category
description: Functional category for the tool. Example: 'AI', 'DevOps', 'Design'.

name: status
description: Current contract status. Values: 'active' (billing), 'cancelled', 'expired'.

name: start_date
description: Date when the subscription term begins. Costs accrue from this date.

name: end_date
description: Date when the subscription ends or cancels. Costs stop strictly after this date.

name: billing_cycle
description: Billing frequency. Values: 'monthly', 'annual'. Determines cost amortization logic.

name: currency
description: Billing currency code. ISO 4217. Default: 'USD'.

name: seats
description: Number of licensed seats/users purchased. Used for PER_SEAT pricing calculations.

name: pricing_model
description: Cost calculation logic. 'PER_SEAT' implies (Unit Price * Seats). 'FLAT_FEE' implies (Unit Price only).

name: unit_price
description: Price per billing cycle in org's currency. For monthly=monthly price, annual=annual price. PER_SEAT: price per user, FLAT_FEE: total price.

name: yearly_price
description: Optional override for annual plans. If set and >0, used instead of unit_price for annual billing cycles.

name: discount_type
description: Type of discount applied. Values: 'percent', 'fixed'.

name: discount_value
description: Value of the discount. E.g., 20 for 20% or 20$ off.

name: auto_renew
description: Flag indicating if the subscription auto-renews at end_date.

name: payment_method
description: Payment instrument used. Example: 'credit_card', 'invoice'.

name: invoice_id_last
description: Reference to the most recent invoice ID for audit.

name: owner_email
description: Budget owner email for notifications.

name: department
description: Department or cost center for chargeback.

name: renewal_date
description: Next renewal date.

name: contract_id
description: Reference to contract document.

name: notes
description: Contract notes and comments.

name: source_currency
description: Original currency of template price (e.g., USD)

name: source_price
description: Original price before conversion

name: exchange_rate_used
description: Exchange rate at time of creation

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp of the last row update.
